articles.title: LQD vs VCLT: Stability or Income Opportunity
articles.mainIdea: LQD vs VCLT: Stability or Income Opportunity
articles.summary: Motley Fool: LQD vs VCLT: Stability or Income Opportunity. Both funds invest in investment-grade corporate bonds, but they sit in very different places on the yield curve. Over time, that distinction determines how each fund moves when interest rates shift
